title: Elderly's Solo Trip ✈️ → UNITED Airlines RUINS it 😓 - India to USA 🇮🇳
description:
This video is based on the harrowing experience of an elderly woman who was left distressed at Newark Airport after a delayed flight from India with #UnitedAirlines. The airline staff's mistreatment and lack of communication left the woman feeling lost, insecure, and, ultimately, in tears at #NewarkAirport 

What You'll See:

🛫 Elderly Traveller's Struggle: Learn about the challenges faced during international flights by elderly solo travellers, especially from India. 
⚖️ Advocating for Passenger Rights: Discover how I stood up for the elderly passenger's rights when the airline neglected her. 
🤝 Helping with Language: See the initial cooperation and later frustration of airline staff as I assisted them.
🌐 Typical Issue: Understand this from another perspective: a similar incident in 2021.
✨ A Solution Offered: https://www.facebook.com/groups/FlightAmigos 

0:00 - problem
1:08 - solution 1
5:52 - solution 2 #FlightAmigos
